Support projects

You can vote for projects and show your support. Others will see your support and so will the city and the planning groups.

Comment on projects

Leave a comment and read what others think about this project

This is your chance to support the infrastructure projects you think are most important in your neighborhood.

The projects are those that were identified by your community planning group in October 2012.
